'''2.3.443''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on October 4, 2022, but was withdrawn later around October 5, 2022 16:00 (UTC), then released as a stable release on October 6, 2022 with a changelog without any clear information.

== Additions ==
* Minecraft Live now in the Launcher.

== Changes ==

* Optimizations and UI improvements.

== Fixes ==

* Fixes to various bugs, crashes & user issues.
